00005 #ifndef SCRIPTING_BRIDGE_H_
00006 #define SCRIPTING_BRIDGE_H_
00007 
00008 #include <map>
00009 #include <nacl/nacl_npapi.h>
00010 
00011 class ScriptingBridge : public NPObject {
00012  public:
00013   typedef bool (ScriptingBridge::*Method)(const NPVariant* args,
00014                                           uint32_t arg_count,
00015                                           NPVariant* result);
00016   typedef bool (ScriptingBridge::*Property)(NPVariant* result);
00017 
00018   explicit ScriptingBridge(NPP npp) : npp_(npp) {}
00019   virtual ~ScriptingBridge();
00020 
00021   // These methods represent the NPObject implementation.  The browser calls
00022   // these methods by calling functions in the |np_class| struct.
00023   virtual void Invalidate();
00024   virtual bool HasMethod(NPIdentifier name);
00025   virtual bool Invoke(NPIdentifier name,
00026                       const NPVariant* args,
00027                       uint32_t arg_count,
00028                       NPVariant* result);
00029   virtual bool InvokeDefault(const NPVariant* args,
00030                              uint32_t arg_count,
00031                              NPVariant* result);
00032   virtual bool HasProperty(NPIdentifier name);
00033   virtual bool GetProperty(NPIdentifier name, NPVariant* result);
00034   virtual bool SetProperty(NPIdentifier name, const NPVariant* value);
00035   virtual bool RemoveProperty(NPIdentifier name);
00036 
00037   static bool InitializeIdentifiers();
00038 
00039   static NPClass np_class;
00040 
00041   // These methods are exposed via the scripting bridge to the browser.
00042   // Each one is mapped to a string id, which is the name of the method that
00043   // the broswer sees.  For example, Paint() has id 'paint', so in the browser
00044   // JavaScript, you would write tumbler.paint() to invoke the Paint() method
00045   // in this object.
00046   //
00047   // Each of these methods wraps a method in the associated Pepper3D object,
00048   // which is where the actual implementation lies.
00049 
00050   // Draws the quarter-circle image representing the stochasitc PI generator.
00051   // bool Paint(const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count, NPVariant* result);
00052 
00053  private:
00054   NPP npp_;
00055   NPObject* window_object_;
00056 
00057   //static NPIdentifier id_paint;
00058 
00059   static std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>* method_table;
00060   static std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>* property_table;
00061 };
00062 
00063 #endif  // EXAMPLES_PI_GENERATOR_SCRIPTING_BRIDGE_H_
